mapper.select: select type, ks_zkz, ks_xm, ks_exm, ks_xb, hj_dm, mm_dm, mz_dm, xl_dm, zhiy_dm, zy_dm, first_zy, jtdm_dm, ks_sfz, ks_birthda, ks_phone, ks_zip, ks_address, ks_bmxs, ks_bmsj, ks_zdyxx, ks_tksj, ks_yqby, ks_qx, sx_dm, modified, ks_oldzkz, zy_mc, mm, sj1, sj2, zzdh, ybmh, bmddm, gzdw, email, msdm, hkszd, gzdwszd, flag, operator, update_date, enabled_flag from stu_student_temp where ks_zkz = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into stu_student_temp ( type, ks_zkz, ks_xm, ks_exm, ks_xb, hj_dm, mm_dm, mz_dm, xl_dm, zhiy_dm, zy_dm, first_zy, jtdm_dm, ks_sfz, ks_birthda, ks_phone, ks_zip, ks_address, ks_bmxs, ks_bmsj, ks_zdyxx, ks_tksj, ks_yqby, ks_qx, sx_dm, modified, ks_oldzkz, zy_mc, mm, sj1, sj2, zzdh, ybmh, bmddm, gzdw, email, msdm, hkszd, gzdwszd, flag, operator, update_date ) values ( #{type}, #{ksZkz}, #{ksXm}, #{ksExm}, #{ksXb}, #{hjDm}, #{mmDm}, #{mzDm}, #{xlDm}, #{zhiyDm}, #{zyDm}, #{firstZy}, #{jtdmDm}, #{ksSfz}, #{ksBirthda}, #{ksPhone}, #{ksZip}, #{ksAddress}, #{ksBmxs}, #{ksBmsj}, #{ksZdyxx}, #{ksTksj}, #{ksYqby}, #{ksQx}, #{sxDm}, #{modified}, #{ksOldzkz}, #{zyMc}, #{mm}, #{sj1}, #{sj2}, #{zzdh}, #{ybmh}, #{bmddm}, #{gzdw}, #{email}, #{msdm}, #{hkszd}, #{gzdwszd}, #{flag}, #{operator}, now() )
mapper.update: update stu_student_temp set enabled_flag =0 where type = #{value}

update stu_student_temp set enabled_flag =0 where type in
#{type}
mapper.insert: insert into stu_student ( id, type, name, gender, home_type, politics, nation, profession, birthday, certificate_no, phone, mphone, address, post_code, email, regionid, child_regionid, password, work_address, classify, audit_status, confirm_status, operator, update_date, create_date, enabled_flag, pic, status ) values ( #{ksZkz}, #{type}, #{ksXm}, #{ksXb}, #{hjDm}, #{mmDm}, #{mzDm}, #{zhiyDm}, #{ksBirthda}, #{ksSfz}, #{zzdh}, #{sj1}, #{ksAddress}, #{ksZip}, #{email}, #{sxDm}, #{ksQx}, #{mm}, #{gzdwszd}, 'a', 'a', 'a', #{operator}, now(), now(), 1, #{picture}, 'a' )
mapper.select: select count(*) from stu_student where enabled_flag = 1 and id = #{studentid}
